tasks.task: Manure Management and Chicken Coop Operation
subtasks: Constructing and maintaining a chicken coop with a roosting pit
Collecting and managing chicken manure for composting
Feeding chickens vegetable scraps and managing their daily activities
Implementing crop rotation and cover cropping practices
Using physical barriers (e.g., Remei fabric) for pest control
Hand weeding and soil cultivation using tractor-assisted tools
Irrigating crops using drip irrigation systems
Planting, cultivating, and harvesting various vegetable crops (e.g., artichokes, carrots, sweet corn, lettuce)
Operating tractors and specialized farm equipment (e.g., spade, double digger) for soil preparation and weed control
Employing beneficial insects and natural pest management techniques
Implementing rotational grazing and manure management for livestock (e.g., cows)
